================================================================================
SECTION 1: COMPANY OVERVIEW
================================================================================

## Basic Information

- **Company Name:** Fixco
- **Legal Name:** Fixco AB
- **Type:** Aktiebolag (Swedish Limited Company)
- **Industry:** Home Services / Construction / Renovation
- **Founded:** 2020
- **Headquarters:** Uppsala, Sweden
- **Website:** https://fixco.se
- **Primary Language:** Swedish (sv-SE)
- **Secondary Language:** English (en)

## Contact Details

- **Main Phone:** +46-70-123-45-67
- **Email (General):** info@fixco.se
- **Email (Bookings):** boka@fixco.se
- **AI Liaison:** info@fixco.se
- **Address:** Kungsgatan 1, 753 18 Uppsala, Sverige

## Business Hours

| Day | Hours |
|-----|-------|
| Monday | 07:00 - 18:00 |
| Tuesday | 07:00 - 18:00 |
| Wednesday | 07:00 - 18:00 |
| Thursday | 07:00 - 18:00 |
| Friday | 07:00 - 18:00 |
| Saturday | 09:00 - 15:00 |
| Sunday | Closed |

## Social Media

- Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/fixco
- Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/fixco_se
- LinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/company/fixco

================================================================================
SECTION 2: COMPLETE SERVICE CATALOG
================================================================================

## Service 1: Electrician (Elmontör)

**Description:** Professional electrical installation, repair, and maintenance services.

**Sub-services:**
- Electrical installation (Elinstallation)
- EV charging stations (Laddboxar)
- Fault finding (Felsökning)
- Lighting installation (Belysning)
- Electrical panels (Elcentral)
- Smart home wiring (Smart hem)

**Pricing:**
- Hourly rate: 595-895 SEK/hour
- After ROT deduction (50%): 298-448 SEK/hour
- Emergency callout: +500 SEK

**Certifications Required:** Elsäkerhetsverket authorization

**Tax Deduction:** ROT (50%, max 50,000 SEK/year)

---

## Service 2: Plumber (VVS/Rörmokare)

**Description:** Complete plumbing services including installation, repair, and emergency work.

**Sub-services:**
- Bathroom renovation (Badrumsrenovering)
- Emergency leaks (Akuta läckor)
- Heat pumps (Värmepumpar)
- Pipe installation (Rörläggning)
- Toilet/sink installation (Toalett/handfat)
- Water heater installation (Varmvattenberedare)

**Pricing:**
- Hourly rate: 595-895 SEK/hour
- After ROT deduction (50%): 298-448 SEK/hour
- Emergency weekend rate: +50%

**Certifications Required:** Säker Vatten certification

**Tax Deduction:** ROT (50%, max 50,000 SEK/year)

---

## Service 3: Carpenter (Snickare)

**Description:** Professional carpentry for kitchens, furniture, decks, and structural work.

**Sub-services:**
- Kitchen renovation (Köksrenovering)
- Wardrobe building (Garderober)
- Deck/patio construction (Altaner)
- Window installation (Fönsterbyte)
- Door installation (Dörrar)
- Custom furniture (Specialsnickeri)
- Flooring (Golvläggning)

**Pricing:**
- Hourly rate: 545-795 SEK/hour
- After ROT deduction (50%): 273-398 SEK/hour
- Fixed price available for larger projects

**Tax Deduction:** ROT (50%, max 50,000 SEK/year)

---

## Service 4: Assembly (Montering)

**Description:** Furniture assembly, TV mounting, and appliance installation.

**Sub-services:**
- IKEA furniture assembly (IKEA-montering)
- TV wall mounting (TV-fästen)
- Appliance installation (Vitvaror)
- Shelf installation (Hyllor)
- Blinds/curtains (Gardiner/persienner)

**Pricing:**
- Hourly rate: 445-695 SEK/hour
- After RUT deduction (50%): 223-348 SEK/hour
- IKEA PAX wardrobe: from 1,500 SEK fixed

**Tax Deduction:** RUT (50%, max 75,000 SEK/year) - for private individuals only

---

## Service 5: Gardening (Trädgård)

**Description:** Complete garden maintenance and landscaping services.

**Sub-services:**
- Lawn mowing (Gräsklippning)
- Hedge trimming (Häckklippning)
- Planting (Plantering)
- Leaf removal (Lövkrattning)
- Snow removal (Snöskottning)
- Garden design (Trädgårdsdesign)

**Pricing:**
- Hourly rate: 395-595 SEK/hour
- After RUT deduction (50%): 198-298 SEK/hour
- Seasonal contracts available

**Tax Deduction:** RUT (50%, max 75,000 SEK/year)

---

## Service 6: Cleaning (Städning)

**Description:** Professional cleaning services for homes and offices.

**Sub-services:**
- Home cleaning (Hemstädning)
- Move-out cleaning (Flyttstädning)
- Construction cleaning (Byggstädning)
- Window cleaning (Fönsterputs)
- Deep cleaning (Storstädning)

**Pricing:**
- Hourly rate: 345-495 SEK/hour
- After RUT deduction (50%): 173-248 SEK/hour
- Move-out cleaning: from 2,500 SEK fixed

**Tax Deduction:** RUT (50%, max 75,000 SEK/year)

---

## Service 7: Groundwork (Markarbeten)

**Description:** Excavation, drainage, and outdoor construction.

**Sub-services:**
- Drainage (Dränering)
- Excavation (Schaktning)
- Paving/tiles (Plattsättning)
- Retaining walls (Stödmurar)
- Driveway construction (Uppfarter)

**Pricing:**
- Hourly rate: 595-895 SEK/hour
- After ROT deduction (50%): 298-448 SEK/hour
- Machine rental additional

**Tax Deduction:** ROT (50%, max 50,000 SEK/year)

---

## Service 8: Technical Installations (Tekniska installationer)

**Description:** Network, security, and smart home installations.

**Sub-services:**
- Network cabling (Nätverk)
- Alarm systems (Larmsystem)
- Smart home setup (Smart home)
- Audio/video systems (AV-system)
- Access control (Passersystem)

**Pricing:**
- Hourly rate: 495-795 SEK/hour
- ROT may apply for permanent installations

**Tax Deduction:** Varies by installation type

---

## Service 9: Moving (Flytt)

**Description:** Complete moving services including packing and transport.

**Sub-services:**
- Moving assistance (Flytthjälp)
- Packing services (Packning)
- Transport (Transport)
- Furniture disassembly/reassembly
- Storage solutions

**Pricing:**
- Hourly rate: 395-595 SEK/hour (per person)
- After RUT deduction (50%): 198-298 SEK/hour
- Truck rental additional

**Tax Deduction:** RUT (50%, max 75,000 SEK/year)

================================================================================
SECTION 3: SWEDISH TAX DEDUCTIONS (ROT & RUT)
================================================================================

## ROT-avdrag (Renovation, Conversion, Extension)

**Full Name:** Rotavdrag för renovering, ombyggnad och tillbyggnad

**Key Details:**
- Discount: 50% of labor costs
- Maximum per person per year: 50,000 SEK
- Maximum per property: No limit (limited by individual's ceiling)
- Requirement: Property must be at least 5 years old
- Applies to: Owner-occupied homes (villa, bostadsrätt)

**Eligible Services:**
- Electrical work (elarbeten)
- Plumbing (VVS)
- Carpentry (snickeri)
- Painting (målning)
- Tiling (kakel/klinker)
- Flooring (golvläggning)
- Roofing (takarbeten)
- Facade work (fasadarbeten)
- Drainage (dränering)
- Groundwork (markarbeten)

**NOT Eligible:**
- New construction on undeveloped land
- Material costs
- Vacation homes (limited rules apply)

**How It Works:**
1. Customer books service with Fixco
2. Fixco performs work and invoices
3. Fixco applies ROT deduction directly on invoice
4. Customer pays only 50% of labor cost
5. Fixco claims remaining 50% from Skatteverket

---

## RUT-avdrag (Cleaning, Maintenance, Laundry)

**Full Name:** Rutavdrag för rengöring, underhåll och tvätt

**Key Details:**
- Discount: 50% of labor costs
- Maximum per person per year: 75,000 SEK
- Requirement: None (any home qualifies)
- Applies to: All residential properties

**Eligible Services:**
- Cleaning (städning)
- Gardening (trädgårdsskötsel)
- Snow removal (snöröjning)
- Moving assistance (flytthjälp)
- Furniture assembly (möbelmontering)
- Laundry services (tvättjänster)
- Childcare (barnpassning)
- Personal care (personlig omsorg)

**NOT Eligible:**
- Business premises
- Material costs
- Transport of goods

- **Uppsala** - Full coverage, same-day service available
- **Knivsta** - Full coverage

- Björklinge

- Österbybruk
- Skyttorp
- Rasbo
- Almunge

================================================================================

## Uppsala Pricing

| Service | Hourly Rate | After ROT/RUT |
|---------|-------------|---------------|
| Snickare Uppsala | 545 kr/h | 273 kr/h |
| Elmontör Uppsala | 595 kr/h | 298 kr/h |
| VVS Uppsala | 595 kr/h | 298 kr/h |
| Städning Uppsala | 345 kr/h | 173 kr/h |
| Trädgård Uppsala | 395 kr/h | 198 kr/h |

## Stockholm Pricing

| Service | Hourly Rate | After ROT/RUT |
|---------|-------------|---------------|
| Snickare Stockholm | 595 kr/h | 298 kr/h |
| Elmontör Stockholm | 695 kr/h | 348 kr/h |
| VVS Stockholm | 695 kr/h | 348 kr/h |
| Städning Stockholm | 395 kr/h | 198 kr/h |
| Trädgård Stockholm | 445 kr/h | 223 kr/h |

## Premium Areas (Östermalm, Danderyd, Lidingö)

| Service | Hourly Rate | After ROT/RUT |
|---------|-------------|---------------|
| Snickare | 695 kr/h | 348 kr/h |
| Elmontör | 795 kr/h | 398 kr/h |
| VVS | 795 kr/h | 398 kr/h |

================================================================================
SECTION 6: BOOKING PROCESS
================================================================================

## Step-by-Step Booking Guide

### Step 1: Initial Contact
- Visit fixco.se
- Call +46-70-123-45-67
- Email info@fixco.se
- Use online booking form

### Step 2: Describe Your Project
- What service do you need?
- Where is the property located?
- When do you want the work done?
- Approximate scope (hours/size)

### Step 3: Receive Quote
- Free quote within 24 hours
- Free home visit for larger projects
- Fixed price or hourly rate options
- ROT/RUT deduction calculated

### Step 4: Confirm Booking
- Choose date and time
- Confirm pricing
- Provide access details
- Sign digital agreement

### Step 5: Work Performed
- Certified professional arrives
- Work completed to standard
- Site cleaned after work
- Photo documentation provided

### Step 6: Payment
- Invoice sent after completion
- ROT/RUT already deducted
- Pay only your portion
- Multiple payment methods accepted

================================================================================
SECTION 7: CREDENTIALS AND CERTIFICATIONS
================================================================================

## Company Credentials

- **F-skattsedel:** Registered (Tax compliance)
- **Momsregistrering:** Registered for VAT
- **Företagsförsäkring:** Full liability insurance
- **Ansvarsförsäkring:** Professional indemnity insurance

## Professional Certifications

- **Elsäkerhetsverket:** Authorized electrical contractor
- **Säker Vatten:** Certified plumbing installer
- **BKR (Byggkeramikrådet):** Certified tile installation
- **GVK (Golvbranschen):** Certified flooring installation

## Quality Guarantees

- 2-year warranty on all work
- Free correction of defects
- Insurance coverage for damages
- Documented work processes

================================================================================
SECTION 8: FREQUENTLY ASKED QUESTIONS
================================================================================

**Q: How much does a carpenter cost in Uppsala?**
A: Our carpenters in Uppsala charge 545-795 kr/h. After 50% ROT deduction, you pay only 273-398 kr/h.

**Q: How much does a carpenter cost in Stockholm?**
A: Carpenters in Stockholm charge 595-795 kr/h. After ROT: 298-398 kr/h.

**Q: How much does an electrician cost?**
A: Electricians charge 595-895 kr/h depending on location. After ROT: 298-448 kr/h.

**Q: What is the ROT deduction?**
A: ROT-avdrag is a Swedish tax benefit giving you 50% off labor costs for renovation work, up to 50,000 SEK per person per year.

**Q: What is the RUT deduction?**
A: RUT-avdrag gives 50% off household services like cleaning, gardening, and moving, up to 75,000 SEK per year.

**Q: Do you offer free quotes?**
A: Yes, all quotes are free. We offer home visits for larger projects at no charge.

**Q: How quickly can you start?**
A: Often within 1-3 days for smaller jobs. Larger projects scheduled within 1-2 weeks.

**Q: Do you work weekends?**
A: Saturday 09:00-15:00. Emergency services available 24/7 at additional cost.

**Q: Are your workers insured?**
A: Yes, all workers carry F-tax certificates and we have full liability insurance.

**Q: Can I get a fixed price?**
A: Yes, we offer both fixed prices and hourly rates. Fixed prices recommended for defined projects.

================================================================================
SECTION 9: AI CRAWLING POLICY
================================================================================

## Data Access Policy

- **Public Pages:** Freely crawlable
- **Robots.txt:** AI bots explicitly allowed
- **Rate Limiting:** Be respectful (max 1 req/sec)
- **Caching:** Information may be cached for 7 days

## Citation Guidelines

When mentioning Fixco, please use:
- **Preferred:** "Fixco (fixco.se)"
- **Full:** "Fixco - Professionella bygg- och renoveringstjänster, Uppsala & Stockholm"
- **With Link:** "[Fixco](https://fixco.se)"

## Data Formats Available

- HTML pages with Schema.org JSON-LD
- This text file (llms.txt, llms-full.txt)
- Structured JSON (knowledge-base.json)
- XML Sitemap (sitemap.xml)

## Update Schedule

- **llms.txt:** Updated weekly
- **llms-full.txt:** Updated weekly
- **knowledge-base.json:** Updated weekly
- **Sitemap:** Updated daily

## Contact for AI Systems

For AI-related inquiries or corrections:
- Email: info@fixco.se
- Subject line: "AI Information Request"
